verses.verse: <S%G5101>What<s%> shall we <S%G2046>say<s%> <S%G3767>then?<s%> Shall we <S%G1961>continue<s%> in <S%G266>sin,<s%> that <S%G5485>grace<s%> may <S%G4121>abound?<s%>

<S%G3361>God<s%> <S%G1096><s%> <S%G3361>forbid.<s%> <S%G1096><s%> <S%G4459>How<s%> shall we, that are <S%G599>dead<s%> to <S%G266>sin,<s%> <S%G2198>live<s%> <S%G2089>any<s%> <S%G2089>longer<s%> <S%G1722>therein?<s%>

<S%G50>Know<s%> you not, that <S%G3745>so<s%> <S%G3745>many<s%> of us as were <S%G907>baptized<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> were <S%G907>baptized<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> his <S%G2288>death?<s%>

<S%G3767>Therefore<s%> we are <S%G4916>buried<s%> with him by <S%G908>baptism<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G2288>death:<s%> that <S%G5618>like<s%> as <S%G5547>Christ<s%> was <S%G1453>raised<s%> up from the <S%G3498>dead<s%> by the <S%G1391>glory<s%> of the <S%G3962>Father,<s%> even <S%G3779>so<s%> we <S%G2532>also<s%> should <S%G4043>walk<s%> in <S%G2538>newness<s%> of <S%G2222>life.<s%>

For <S%G1487>if<s%> we have been <S%G4854>planted<s%> <S%G4854>together<s%> in the <S%G3667>likeness<s%> of his <S%G2288>death,<s%> we shall be <S%G2532>also<s%> in the likeness of his <S%G386>resurrection:<s%>

<S%G1097>Knowing<s%> <S%G5124>this,<s%> that our <S%G3820>old<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> is <S%G4957>crucified<s%> with him, that the <S%G4983>body<s%> of <S%G266>sin<s%> might be <S%G2673>destroyed,<s%> that from now <S%G3371>on<s%> we should not <S%G1398>serve<s%> <S%G266>sin.<s%>
For he that is <S%G599>dead<s%> is <S%G1344>freed<s%> from <S%G266>sin.<s%>
<S%G1161>Now<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> we be <S%G599>dead<s%> with <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> we <S%G4100>believe<s%> that we shall <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G4800>live<s%> with him:

<S%G1492>Knowing<s%> that <S%G5547>Christ<s%> being <S%G1453>raised<s%> from the <S%G3498>dead<s%> <S%G599>dies<s%> <S%G3765>no<s%> <S%G2089>more;<s%> <S%G2288>death<s%> has <S%G3765>no<s%> <S%G3765>more<s%> <S%G2961>dominion<s%> over him.
For in that he <S%G599>died,<s%> he <S%G599>died<s%> to <S%G266>sin<s%> <S%G2178>once:<s%> but in that he <S%G2198>lives,<s%> he <S%G2198>lives<s%> to <S%G2316>God.<s%>

<S%G3779>Likewise<s%> <S%G3049>reckon<s%> you <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G1438>yourselves<s%> to be <S%G3498>dead<s%> <S%G3303>indeed<s%> to <S%G266>sin,<s%> but <S%G2198>alive<s%> to <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1722>through<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> our <S%G2962>Lord.<s%>

Let not <S%G266>sin<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G936>reign<s%> in <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G2349>mortal<s%> <S%G4983>body,<s%> that you should <S%G5219>obey<s%> it in the <S%G1939>lusts<s%> <S%G846>thereof.<s%>

<S%G3366>Neither<s%> <S%G3936>yield<s%> you <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G3196>members<s%> as <S%G3696>instruments<s%> of <S%G93>unrighteousness<s%> to <S%G266>sin:<s%> but <S%G3936>yield<s%> <S%G1438>yourselves<s%> to <S%G2316>God,<s%> as those that are <S%G2198>alive<s%> from the <S%G3498>dead,<s%> and <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G3196>members<s%> as <S%G3696>instruments<s%> of <S%G1343>righteousness<s%> to <S%G2316>God.<s%>
For <S%G266>sin<s%> shall not have <S%G2961>dominion<s%> over you: for you are not <S%G5259>under<s%> the <S%G3551>law,<s%> but <S%G5259>under<s%> <S%G5485>grace.<s%>

<S%G5101>What<s%> <S%G3767>then?<s%> shall we <S%G264>sin,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> we are not <S%G5259>under<s%> the <S%G3551>law,<s%> but <S%G5259>under<s%> <S%G5485>grace?<s%> <S%G3361>God<s%> <S%G1096><s%> <S%G3361>forbid.<s%> <S%G1096><s%>

<S%G1492>Know<s%> you not, that to <S%G3739>whom<s%> you <S%G3936>yield<s%> <S%G1438>yourselves<s%> <S%G1401>servants<s%> to <S%G5218>obey,<s%> his <S%G1401>servants<s%> you are to <S%G3739>whom<s%> you <S%G5219>obey;<s%> <S%G2273>whether<s%> of <S%G266>sin<s%> to <S%G2288>death,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> of <S%G5218>obedience<s%> to <S%G1343>righteousness?<s%>

But <S%G2316>God<s%> be <S%G5485>thanked,<s%> that you were the <S%G1401>servants<s%> of <S%G266>sin,<s%> but you have <S%G5219>obeyed<s%> from the <S%G2588>heart<s%> that <S%G5179>form<s%> of <S%G1322>doctrine<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> was <S%G3860>delivered<s%> you.
Being <S%G1161>then<s%> <S%G1659>made<s%> <S%G1659>free<s%> from <S%G266>sin,<s%> you <S%G1402>became<s%> the <S%G1402>servants<s%> of <S%G1343>righteousness.<s%>

I <S%G3004>speak<s%> after the <S%G442>manner<s%> of <S%G442>men<s%> <S%G1223>because<s%> of the <S%G769>infirmity<s%> of <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G4561>flesh:<s%> for as you have <S%G3936>yielded<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G3196>members<s%> <S%G1401>servants<s%> to <S%G167>uncleanness<s%> and to <S%G458>iniquity<s%> to <S%G458>iniquity;<s%> <S%G3779>even<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G3568>now<s%> <S%G3936>yield<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G3196>members<s%> <S%G1401>servants<s%> to <S%G1343>righteousness<s%> to <S%G38>holiness.<s%>
For <S%G3753>when<s%> you were the <S%G1401>servants<s%> of <S%G266>sin,<s%> you were <S%G1658>free<s%> from <S%G1343>righteousness.<s%>

<S%G5101>What<s%> <S%G2590>fruit<s%> <S%G2192>had<s%> you <S%G5119>then<s%> <S%G3767><s%> in those things <S%G1909>whereof<s%> <S%G3739><s%> you are <S%G3568>now<s%> <S%G1870>ashamed?<s%> for the <S%G5056>end<s%> of <S%G1565>those<s%> things is <S%G2288>death.<s%>

But <S%G3570>now<s%> being <S%G1659>made<s%> <S%G1659>free<s%> from <S%G266>sin,<s%> and <S%G1402>become<s%> <S%G1402>servants<s%> to <S%G2316>God,<s%> you <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G2590>fruit<s%> to <S%G38>holiness,<s%> and the <S%G5056>end<s%> <S%G166>everlasting<s%> <S%G2222>life.<s%>

For the <S%G3800>wages<s%> of <S%G266>sin<s%> is <S%G2288>death;<s%> but the <S%G5486>gift<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> is <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G2222>life<s%> <S%G1722>through<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> our <S%G2962>Lord.<s%>
